title: Kindly Identify the Font Please
content:
Hello,

Every one,

Can you please identify the font.

Thanks  
Regards,  
Hasnain Munawar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Freedom-Back_5445.jpg)

Font: 

 Kaleko 105 Round Bold 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171557/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
Hiruko Alternate, by Thinkdust, comes very close:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/hiruko/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171557/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/hiruko/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/hiruko/")
I considered Hess Gothic Round, but it doesn't have a t with a curled foot (same problem I had with Hiruko)....
